summary: In January, KrebsOnSecurity wrote about rapper Punchmade Dev, whose music videos sing the praises of a cybercrime lifestyle.  That story showed how Punchmade's social media profiles promoted Punchmade-themed online stores selling bank account and payment card data.  Now the Kentucky native is suing his financial institution after it blocked a $75,000 wire transfer and froze his account, citing an active law enforcement investigation
title: Cybercrime Rapper Sues Bank over Fraud Investigation
